Jeff Shaw

I spent a couple years working in video production and post production while I lived in Portland.

On the Steps

This track is slow, so everything from the shutter speed to the editing cuts are slow to keep the style smooth.

I used a tighter focal length to soften the surroundings. Lighting is very carefully planned, both in placement and timing, and is designed to melt in with dim ambient reflections.

Salad Days

Pickathon is Portland's largest music festival. Like everything in Portland, it's super underground and happens in a forest.
